meanings.sent1: She danced with so much umph at the party.
meanings.sent2: His umph during the game inspired the team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's umph for chasing its tail was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The umph of the roaring waterfall was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The umph of the music made everyone want to dance.

meanings.sent1: The storm's umph caused damage to the trees.
meanings.sent2: Her speech lacked the necessary umph to captivate the audience.
meanings.sent3: The umph of the lion's roar echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The umph of the engine signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The umph of the waves crashing against the shore was powerful.

meanings.definition: To add emphasis or force to something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to umph up her presentation with colorful visuals.
meanings.sent2: He always umphs his arguments with strong evidence.
meanings.sent3: The chef umphed the flavor of the dish with a pinch of spice.
meanings.sent4: The coach umphed the team's morale with a motivational speech.
meanings.sent5: The singer umphed her performance with a high note at the end.
